eventMessages.visit_create_below_queue_position_messag: Hi {{NAME}}, your visit ref is: {{VISIT}}.  You are currently {{POSITION}} in the queue. {{LINK}}
eventMessages.visit_create_above_queue_position_messag: Hi {{NAME}}, your visit ref is: {{VISIT}}.  You are currently {{POSITION}} in the queue, we will notify when to return. {{LINK}}
eventMessages.appointment_arrive_message: Hi {{NAME}}, we shall call you shortly for your {{SERVICE}} appointment, your visit ref is: {{VISIT}}.
eventMessages.visit_call_message: Hi {{NAME}}, Please go to {{SERVICEPOINT}}, where {{STAFF}} is waiting to serve you.
eventMessages.visit_callback_message: Hi {{NAME}}, We shall be ready to serve you soon, please make your way back to {{BRANCH}}.
eventMessages.visit_ended_message: Thank you for visiting {{BRANCH}}, we look forward to seeing you again soon.
